name: Cash Darts: Legally Bet and Win
name_original: Cash Darts: Legally Bet and Win
description:
You’ve done it in the basement. You’ve done it in the bar. Now do it for money.

We’ve made the classic game of darts even more interesting. Join b Spot to Bet & Win cash. From 501 to Cricket, here’s your chance to test your steady hand, nail a bullseye and walk away with real money.

Aim your dart, let it ride, and watch your cash payouts rain down in this exciting take on a pub mainstay.

Game Features:

7 Game Modes
-- Choose from 7 unique ways to play. We’ve got 301, 501, Around the Clock, Halvers, Cricket, Baseball and the best of all: For Money

7 Unique Darts
-- Unlock epic power-up darts as you play through different levels.

The Bonus Round
-- Place a bet, toss your dart and collect cash payouts in the lightning-fast Bonus Round

Splendid Dart Control
-- Enjoy top-notch gameplay with responsive dart-throwing action.

Cash Darts is part of the b Spot mobile game network.

b Spot is a new and exciting way to legally gamble in the US. With $1,000s at stake, b Spot lets you Bet & Win cash while playing our growing network of arcade, action, card and puzzle games. For real.

Your money is FDIC insured. Cash Out anytime.

Stop playing for virtual currency. Start playing for real cash.

LET’S BREAK IT DOWN

- b Spot is legal and licensed in the US.

- Play games for free before you bet.

- Payouts are determined by live horse racing. That’s right, the Sport of Kings.

- Headquartered in Los Angeles, b Spot is authorized to conduct online horse wagering pursuant to state licenses and the federal Interstate Horseracing Act.

- We currently accept bets from residents of: California and Oregon. The following states are coming soon: Arkansas, Colorado, Delaware, Florida, Idaho, Illinois, Iowa, Kentucky, Louisiana, Maryland, Massachusetts, Michigan, Montana, New Hampshire, New Mexico, New York, North Dakota, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, South Dakota, Tennessee, Vermont, Virginia, Washington, West Virginia and Wyoming.
